Class org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.mapReduceLayer.PigMapReduce.Reduce

The superclass changed from org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapReduceBase to org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer.
Removed interface org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Reducer.

Change in exceptions thrown from java.io.IOException to (java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException).
Change of visibility from public to protected.
